page.title: Brown University
page.text: Brown University is a private Ivy League research university in [[huio]]

page.title: Providence, Rhode Island
page.text: Providence is the capital of Rhode Island. It is home to [[many]] universities, including [[Brown University i| Brown]] and Providence College

page.title: The Nelson Center for Entrepreneurship
page.text: The Nelson Center for Entrepreneurship is a private [[business and research]] incubator at [[Brown University]].
